Parameters:

getColour

int getColour(NodeRef node,
              double time)
This method will return the colour on the ancestral branch if the given time is older than the parent of the given node.

Parameters:
node -
Returns:
the colour of the branch above the given node at the given (absolute) time.

getColourDataType

DataType getColourDataType()
Returns:
the dataType that describes the colours.

getColourChanges

Parameters:
node -
Returns:
